ActivityId : 2e40d9bd-1902-444c-abf3-6ea0002efdc5 AutoScalingGroupName : Cause : At 2015-11-22T16:09:03Z instance i-93633f9b was taken out of service in response to a user request. example.description: This example terminates the specified instance without decreasing the desired capacity of its Auto Scaling group. Auto Scaling launches a replacement instance.
